00046 /*
00047 ** These are all the globals we should ever have in this project...
00048 */
00049 HINSTANCE g_hinstance   = 0; 
00050 CTwnDsm   *g_ptwndsm    = 0; 
00051 CTwnDsmLog  *g_ptwndsmlog = 0; 
00093 DSMENTRY DSM_Entry(TW_IDENTITY  *_pOrigin,
00094                    TW_IDENTITY  *_pDest,
00095                    TW_UINT32    _DG,
00096                    TW_UINT16    _DAT,
00097                    TW_UINT16    _MSG,
00098                    TW_MEMREF    _pData)
00099 {
00100   TW_UINT16 rcDSM;
00101 
00102   // Validate...
00103   if (0 == _pOrigin)
00104   {
00105     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00106   }
00107 
00108   // If we're processing DG_CONTROL/DAT_PARENT/MSG_OPENDSM then see
00109   // if we need to create our CTwnDsm object.  We don't want to
00110   // allocate any resources prior to new CTwnDsm!!!
00111   if (   (_MSG == MSG_OPENDSM)
00112     && (_DAT == DAT_PARENT)
00113     && (_DG  == DG_CONTROL)
00114     && (0 == g_ptwndsm))
00115   {
00116     g_ptwndsm = new CTwnDsm;
00117     if (0 == g_ptwndsm)
00118     {
00119           kPANIC("Failed to new CTwnDsm!!!");
00120       return TWRC_FAILURE;
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   // If we have no CTwnDsm object, then we're in trouble, but
00125   // try to handle DAT_STATUS in case it gets called before
00126   // MSG_OPENDSM or after MSG_CLOSEDSM...
00127   if (0 == g_ptwndsm)
00128   {
00129     if (   (_MSG == MSG_GET)
00130       && (_DAT == DAT_STATUS)
00131       && (_DG  == DG_CONTROL)
00132       && (0 != _pData))
00133     {
00134         ((TW_STATUS*)_pData)->ConditionCode = TWCC_BUMMER;
00135     return (TWRC_SUCCESS);
00136     }
00137     else
00138     {
00139         //kLOG((kLOGERR,"DAT_STATUS called before MSG_OPENDSM or after MSG_CLOSEDSM..."));
00140     return (TWRC_FAILURE);
00141     }
00142   }
00143 
00144   // Transfer control over to our dsm object, otherwise we'll
00145   // be doing g_ptwndsm all over the place...
00146   rcDSM = g_ptwndsm->DSM_Entry(_pOrigin,_pDest,_DG,_DAT,_MSG,_pData);
00147 
00148   // If we successfully processed DG_CONTROL/DAT_PARENT/MSG_CLOSEDSM,
00149   // then destroy our object.  We don't want to have any resources
00150   // lingering around after we destroy our CTwnDsm object!!!
00151   if (   (TWRC_SUCCESS == rcDSM)
00152     && (_MSG == MSG_CLOSEDSM)
00153     && (_DAT == DAT_PARENT)
00154     && (_DG  == DG_CONTROL))
00155   {
00156     delete g_ptwndsm;
00157     g_ptwndsm = 0;
00158   }
00159 
00160   // All done...
00161   return rcDSM;
00162 }

00171 CTwnDsm::CTwnDsm()
00172 {
00173   // Zero out the pod...
00174   memset(&pod,0,sizeof(pod));
00175 
00176   // Get our logging object...
00177   g_ptwndsmlog = new CTwnDsmLog;
00178   if (!g_ptwndsmlog)
00179   {
00180     kPANIC("Failed to new CTwnDsmLog!!!");
00181   }
00182 
00183   // If logging is on, then this is a good chance to dump information
00184   // about ourselves...
00185   kLOG((kLOGINFO,"************************************************"));
00186   kLOG((kLOGINFO,"%s",TWNDSM_ORGANIZATION));
00187   kLOG((kLOGINFO,"%s",TWNDSM_DESCRIPTION));
00188   kLOG((kLOGINFO,"version: %s.%s",TWNDSM_VERSIONMAJOR,TWNDSM_VERSIONMINOR));
00189 
00190   // Get our application object...
00191   pod.m_ptwndsmapps = new CTwnDsmApps();
00192   if (!pod.m_ptwndsmapps)
00193   {
00194     kPANIC("Failed to new CTwnDsmApps!!!");
00195   }
00196 }

00204 CTwnDsm::~CTwnDsm()
00205 {
00206   if (pod.m_ptwndsmapps)
00207   {
00208     delete pod.m_ptwndsmapps;
00209   }
00210   if (g_ptwndsmlog)
00211   {
00212     delete g_ptwndsmlog;
00213   }
00214   memset(&pod,0,sizeof(pod));
00215 }

00223 TW_UINT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_Entry(TW_IDENTITY  *_pAppId,
00224                              TW_IDENTITY  *_pDsId,
00225                              TW_UINT32    _DG,
00226                              TW_UINT16    _DAT,
00227                              TW_UINT16    _MSG,
00228                              TW_MEMREF    _pData)
00229 {
00230   TW_UINT16   rcDSM;
00231   bool      bPrinted;
00232   TW_CALLBACK *ptwcallback;
00233  
00234   // Print the triplets to stdout for information purposes
00235   bPrinted = printTripletsInfo(_DG,_DAT,_MSG,_pData);
00236 
00237   // Check that the id is valid...
00238   if (!pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppValidateId(_pAppId))
00239   {
00240   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(0,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
00241     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00242   }
00243 
00244   // Sniff for the application forwarding an event to the
00245   // DS. It may be possible that the app has a message waiting for
00246   // it because it didn't register a callback.
00247   if (   (DAT_EVENT == _DAT)
00248     && (MSG_PROCESSEVENT == _MSG))
00249   {
00250   if (pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackIsWaiting(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id))
00251   {
00252     ptwcallback = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackGet(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id);
00253     ((TW_EVENT*)(_pData))->TWMessage = ptwcallback->Message;
00254     ptwcallback->Message = 0;
00255     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackSetWaiting(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id,FALSE);
00256     return TWRC_DSEVENT;
00257   }
00258   // No callback, so fall on through...
00259   }
00260 
00261   // Is this msg for us?
00262   switch (_DAT)
00263   {
00264     default:
00265       // check if the application is open or not.  If it isn't, we have a bad sequence
00266       if (dsmState_Open == pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetState(_pAppId))
00267       {
00268       // Issue the command...
00269       if (0 != pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetEntryProc(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id))
00270       {
00271       rcDSM = (pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetEntryProc(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id))(_pAppId,
00272                                       _DG,
00273                                       _DAT,
00274                                       _MSG,
00275                                       _pData);
00276       }
00277 
00278       // For some reason we have no pointer to the dsentry function...
00279       else
00280       {
00281       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_OPERATIONERROR);
00282       kLOG((kLOGERR,"DS_Entry is null...%ld",_pAppId->Id));
00283       rcDSM = TWRC_FAILURE;
00284       }
00285       }
00286       else
00287       {
00288           pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_SEQERROR);
00289           rcDSM = TWRC_FAILURE;
00290       }
00291       break;
00292 
00293     case DAT_PARENT:
00294       rcDSM = DSM_Parent(_pAppId,_MSG,_pData);
00295       break;
00296 
00297     case DAT_IDENTITY:
00298       rcDSM = DSM_Identity(_pAppId,_MSG,(TW_IDENTITY*)_pData);
00299       break;
00300 
00301     case DAT_STATUS:
00302       rcDSM = DSM_Status(_pAppId,_MSG,(TW_STATUS*)_pData);
00303       break;
00304 
00305     case DAT_CALLBACK:
00306       rcDSM = DSM_Callback(_pAppId,_pDsId,_MSG,(TW_CALLBACK*)_pData);
00307       break;
00308 
00309   case DAT_NULL:
00310     // Note how the origin and destination are switched for this
00311     // call (and only this call).  Because, of course, this
00312     // message is being send from the driver to the application...
00313       rcDSM = DSM_Null(_pDsId,_pAppId,_MSG);
00314     break;
00315   }
00316 
00317   // Log how it went...
00318   if (bPrinted)
00319   {
00320     char szRc[64];
00321     StringFromRC(szRc,NCHARS(szRc),rcDSM);
00322     kLOG((kLOGINFO,szRc));
00323   }
00324 
00325   return rcDSM;
00326 }

00337 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_Status(TW_IDENTITY  *_pAppId,
00338                TW_UINT16    _MSG,
00339                TW_STATUS    *_pStatus)
00340 {
00341   TW_INT16 result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00342 
00343   switch (_MSG)
00344   {
00345     case MSG_GET:
00346   case MSG_CHECKSTATUS:
00347      _pStatus->ConditionCode = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetConditionCode(_pAppId);
00348        _pStatus->Reserved = 0;
00349       break;
00350 
00351     default:
00352       result = TWRC_FAILURE;
00353       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
00354       break;
00355   }
00356 
00357   return result;
00358 }

00361 
00367 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_Parent(TW_IDENTITY  *_pAppId,
00368                TW_UINT16    _MSG,
00369                TW_MEMREF    _MemRef)
00370 {
00371   TW_UINT16 result;
00372 
00373   // Validate...
00374   if (0 == _pAppId)
00375   {
00376     kLOG((kLOGERR,"_pAppId is null"));
00377     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00378     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00379   }
00380 
00381   // Init stuff...
00382   result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00383 
00384   // Process the message...
00385   switch (_MSG)
00386   {
00387     case MSG_OPENDSM:
00388       // Try to add the proposed item...
00389       result = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AddApp(_pAppId,_MemRef);
00390       break;
00391 
00392     case MSG_CLOSEDSM:
00393       // Try to remove the proposed item...
00394       result = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->RemoveApp(_pAppId);
00395       break;
00396 
00397     default:
00398       result = TWRC_FAILURE;
00399       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
00400       break;
00401   }
00402 
00403   return result;
00404 }

00413 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_Identity(TW_IDENTITY  *_pAppId,
00414                  TW_UINT16    _MSG,
00415                  TW_IDENTITY  *_pDsId)
00416 {
00417   TW_INT16  result;
00418 
00419   // Validate...
00420   if (0 == _pAppId)
00421   {
00422     kLOG((kLOGERR,"_pAppId is null"));
00423     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00424     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00425   }
00426   else if (_pAppId->Id >= MAX_NUM_APPS)
00427   {
00428     kLOG((kLOGERR,"too many apps"));
00429     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_MAXCONNECTIONS);
00430     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00431   }
00432 
00433   // Init stuff...
00434   result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00435 
00436   // Pick the message...
00437   if (dsmState_Open == pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetState(_pAppId))
00438   {
00439     switch (_MSG)
00440     {
00441       case MSG_OPENDS:
00442         result = OpenDS(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00443         break;
00444 
00445       case MSG_CLOSEDS:
00446         result = CloseDS(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00447         break;
00448 
00449       case MSG_USERSELECT:
00450         result = DSM_SelectDS(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00451         break;
00452 
00453       case MSG_GETFIRST:
00454         result = DSM_GetFirst(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00455         break;
00456 
00457       case MSG_GETNEXT:
00458         result = DSM_GetNext(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00459         break;
00460 
00461       case MSG_GETDEFAULT:
00462         result = GetMatchingDefault(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00463         break;
00464 
00465       default:
00466         result = TWRC_FAILURE;
00467         pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
00468         break;
00469     }
00470   }
00471   else
00472   {
00473     result = TWRC_FAILURE;
00474     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_SEQERROR);
00475   }
00476 
00477   return result;
00478 }

00481 
00487 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_Callback(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
00488                  TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId,
00489                  TW_UINT16   _MSG,
00490                  TW_CALLBACK *_pData)
00491 {
00492   TW_INT16    result;
00493   TW_CALLBACK *ptwcallback;
00494 
00495   // Init stuff...
00496   result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00497   ptwcallback = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackGet(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id);
00498 
00499   // Take action on the message...
00500   switch (_MSG)
00501   {
00502     case MSG_REGISTER_CALLBACK:
00503       {
00504     memcpy(ptwcallback,_pData,sizeof(*ptwcallback));
00505     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackSetWaiting(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id,FALSE);
00506       }
00507       break;
00508 
00509     default:
00510       result = TWRC_FAILURE;
00511       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
00512       break;
00513   }
00514 
00515   return result;
00516 }

00519 
00529 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::OpenDS(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
00530              TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
00531 {
00532   TW_INT16  result;
00533  
00534   // Validate...
00535   if (0 == _pAppId)
00536   {
00537     kLOG((kLOGERR,"_pAppId is null"));
00538     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00539     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00540   }
00541   else if (   (_pAppId->Id < 1)
00542        || (_pAppId->Id >= MAX_NUM_APPS))
00543   {
00544     kLOG((kLOGERR,"id is out of range...%d",_pAppId->Id));
00545     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_MAXCONNECTIONS);
00546     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00547   }
00548 
00549   // Init stuff...
00550   result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00551 
00552   // check that we are in the proper state
00553   if (dsmState_Open != pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetState(_pAppId))
00554   {
00555     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_SEQERROR);
00556     return(TWRC_FAILURE);
00557   }
00558 
00559   // Do we need to find a source to open
00560   if (0 == _pDsId->Id)
00561   {
00562     // Does the app know the name of the source it wants to open
00563     if (0 != _pDsId->ProductName[0])
00564     {
00565       // The application is passing me a TW_IDENTITY structure that contains
00566       // the name of the source to select.
00567       result = GetDSFromProductName(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00568 
00569       // was the id found or specified by the app?
00570       if (TWRC_SUCCESS != result)
00571       {
00572         pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_NODS);
00573         return(result);
00574       }
00575     }
00576 
00577     // Does the application want me to choose the default?
00578     // Or no Source located by name
00579     if (0 == _pDsId->ProductName[0]) 
00580     {
00581       // -if the name of the source is NULL, and the id is 0, the application is
00582       //  telling me to select the default source.
00583       result = GetMatchingDefault(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00584 
00585       // was the id found or specified by the app?
00586       if (TWRC_SUCCESS != result)
00587       {
00588         return(result);
00589       }
00590     }
00591   }
00592 
00593   // Load the driver...
00594   result = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->LoadDS(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id);
00595   if (result != TWRC_SUCCESS)
00596   {
00597     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_NODS);
00598     return(TWRC_FAILURE);
00599   }
00600 
00601   // open the ds
00602   if (0 != pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetEntryProc(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id))
00603   {
00604     result = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetEntryProc(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id)(_pAppId,
00605                                    DG_CONTROL,
00606                                    DAT_IDENTITY,
00607                                    MSG_OPENDS,
00608                                    (TW_MEMREF)_pDsId);
00609 
00610     if (TWRC_SUCCESS != result)
00611     {
00612       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_OPERATIONERROR);
00613     }
00614   }
00615 
00616   // Remember that we opened this DS...
00617   if (TWRC_SUCCESS == result)
00618   {
00619     #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP)
00620     // skip...
00621     #elif (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
00622     FILE *pfile;
00623     char *szHome;
00624     char szFile[FILENAME_MAX];
00625     szHome = getenv("HOME");
00626     if (szHome)
00627     {
00628       SSTRCPY(szFile,sizeof(szFile),szHome);
00629       SSTRCAT(szFile,sizeof(szFile),"/.twndsmrc");
00630       mkdir(szFile,0660);
00631       SSTRCAT(szFile,sizeof(szFile),"/defaultds");
00632       FOPEN(pfile,szFile,"w");
00633       if (pfile)
00634       {
00635       fwrite(pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetPath(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id),
00636            1,
00637          strlen(pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetPath(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id)),
00638          pfile);
00639       fclose(pfile);
00640       }
00641     }
00642     #else
00643     #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
00644     #endif
00645   }
00646 
00647 
00648   return result;
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00652 
00656 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::CloseDS(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
00657               TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
00658 {
00659   TW_INT16  result;
00660 
00661   // Validate...
00662   if (0 == _pAppId)
00663   {
00664   kLOG((kLOGERR,"_pAppId is null"));
00665   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00666   return TWRC_FAILURE;
00667   }
00668   else if (   (_pAppId->Id < 1)
00669        || (_pAppId->Id >= MAX_NUM_APPS))
00670   {
00671   kLOG((kLOGERR,"id out of range...%d",_pAppId->Id));
00672   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00673   return TWRC_FAILURE;
00674   }
00675 
00676   // Init stuff...
00677   result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00678 
00679   // check that we are in the proper state
00680   if (dsmState_Open != pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetState(_pAppId))
00681   {
00682     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_SEQERROR);
00683     return TWRC_FAILURE;
00684   }
00685 
00686   // close the ds
00687   if (0 != pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetEntryProc(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id))
00688   {
00689     result = (pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetEntryProc(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id))(_pAppId,
00690                                    DG_CONTROL,
00691                                    DAT_IDENTITY,
00692                                    MSG_CLOSEDS,
00693                                    (TW_MEMREF)_pDsId);
00694 
00695     if (TWRC_SUCCESS != result)
00696     {
00697       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_OPERATIONERROR);
00698     return result;
00699   }
00700 
00701   // Cleanup...
00702   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->UnloadDS(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id);
00703   }
00704 
00705   // All done...
00706   return result;
00707 }

00718 BOOL WINAPI DllMain(HINSTANCE _hmodule,
00719           DWORD     _dwReasonCalled,
00720           LPVOID)
00721 {
00722   switch (_dwReasonCalled)
00723   {
00724     case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:
00725     case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00726       break;
00727     case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00728       g_hinstance = _hmodule;
00729       break;
00730     case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00731       break;
00732   }
00733   return(TRUE);
00734 }
00735 #elif (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
00736   // Nothing for us to do...
00737 #else
00738   #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
00739 #endif

00748 #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP)
00749 BOOL CALLBACK SelectDlgProc(HWND   _hWnd,
00750               UINT   _Message,
00751               WPARAM _wParam,
00752               LPARAM _lParam)
00753 {
00754   if (g_ptwndsm)
00755   {
00756     return g_ptwndsm->SelectDlgProc(_hWnd,_Message,_wParam,_lParam);
00757   }
00758   else
00759   {
00760     return TRUE;
00761   }
00762 }
00763 #elif (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
00764   // We don't have one of these...
00765 #else
00766   #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
00767 #endif

00770 
00778 #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP)
00779 BOOL CTwnDsm::SelectDlgProc(HWND hWnd, UINT Message,
00780               WPARAM wParam,
00781               LPARAM /*lParam - unused*/)
00782 {
00783   TW_IDENTITY *pAppId;
00784   int     nIndex;
00785   int     nSelect;
00786   TW_UINT32   x;
00787   char      *szProductName;
00788   HWND      hListBox;
00789 
00790   // Init stuff...
00791   nSelect = 0;
00792   pAppId = pod.m_pSelectDlgAppId;
00793 
00794   // Process the message...
00795   switch (Message)
00796   {
00797     case WM_INITDIALOG:
00798       hListBox = ::GetDlgItem(hWnd,ID_LST_SOURCES);
00799       if (hListBox) 
00800       {
00801     SendMessage(hListBox,LB_RESETCONTENT,(WPARAM)NULL,(LPARAM)NULL);
00802 
00803     for (x = 1; x < MAX_NUM_DS; ++x)
00804         {
00805       // We expect the list to be contiguous...
00806       szProductName = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(pAppId,x)->ProductName;
00807       if (!szProductName[0])
00808       {
00809         break;
00810       }
00811       // Display the name...
00812           nIndex = (int)SendMessage(hListBox,LB_ADDSTRING,(WPARAM)NULL,(LPARAM)szProductName);
00813           if (LB_ERR == nIndex)
00814           {
00815             break;
00816           }
00817       // Associate the id with the name...
00818           nIndex = (int)SendMessage(hListBox,
00819                   LB_SETITEMDATA,
00820                   (WPARAM)nIndex,
00821                   (LPARAM)pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(pAppId,x)->Id);
00822           if (LB_ERR == nIndex)
00823           {
00824             break;
00825           }
00826       // Remember this item if it's the default...
00827       if (!strcmp(pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetPath(pAppId,x),pod.m_DefaultDSPath))
00828       {
00829         nSelect = x;
00830       }
00831         }
00832     // If we have no drivers, then disable the OK button...
00833     if (pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetNumDs(pAppId) < 1)
00834         {
00835           HWND hOK= ::GetDlgItem(hWnd,IDOK);
00836           EnableWindow(hOK, FALSE);
00837         }
00838     // Otherwise select the defaulted item...
00839         else
00840         {
00841           nIndex = (int)SendMessage(hListBox,
00842                       LB_FINDSTRINGEXACT,
00843                   (WPARAM)-1,
00844                   (LPARAM)pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(pAppId,nSelect)->ProductName);
00845           if (LB_ERR == nIndex)
00846           {
00847             nIndex = 0;
00848           }
00849           SendMessage(hListBox,LB_SETCURSEL,(WPARAM)nIndex,(LPARAM)NULL);
00850         }
00851       }
00852       return TRUE;
00853 
00854     case WM_COMMAND:
00855       switch (LOWORD(wParam))
00856       {
00857         case ID_LST_SOURCES: 
00858           if (HIWORD(wParam) != LBN_DBLCLK) 
00859             break; 
00860             // drop through...
00861 
00862         case IDOK:
00863           {
00864             HWND hListBox = ::GetDlgItem(hWnd, ID_LST_SOURCES); 
00865             int  nIndex   = 0;
00866             if ( hListBox ) 
00867             {
00868               nIndex = (int)SendMessage(hListBox,LB_GETCURSEL,(WPARAM)0,(LPARAM)0);
00869               if (LB_ERR == nIndex)
00870               {
00871                 // if there is no selection should not have OK available
00872         // to press in the first place.
00873                 return TRUE;
00874               }
00875               nIndex = (int)SendMessage(hListBox,LB_GETITEMDATA,(WPARAM)nIndex,(LPARAM)0);
00876               if (LB_ERR != nIndex)
00877               {
00878                 pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(pAppId,nIndex);
00879               }
00880             }
00881             EndDialog(hWnd, IDOK);
00882             return TRUE;
00883           }
00884         case IDCANCEL:
00885           EndDialog(hWnd, IDCANCEL);
00886           return TRUE;
00887       }
00888       break;
00889   }
00890   return FALSE;
00891 }
00892 #elif (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
00893   // We don't have anything to do on Linux...
00894 #else
00895   #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
00896 #endif
00897 
00898 
00899 
00906 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_SelectDS(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
00907                  TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
00908 {
00909   // Validate...
00910   if (0 == _pAppId)
00911   {
00912     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00913   return TWRC_FAILURE;
00914   }
00915   if (   (_pAppId->Id < 1)
00916     || (_pAppId->Id >= MAX_NUM_APPS))
00917   {
00918     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00919   return TWRC_FAILURE;
00920   }
00921   else if (0 == _pDsId)
00922   {
00923     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADVALUE);
00924   return TWRC_FAILURE;
00925   }
00926   else if (dsmState_Open != pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetState(_pAppId))
00927   {
00928     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_SEQERROR);
00929   return TWRC_FAILURE;
00930   }
00931 
00932   // Make sure the id is 0 before we go into this...
00933   _pDsId->Id = 0;
00934 
00935   // Windows...
00936   #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP)
00937 
00938     HKEY    hKey;
00939     long    status;
00940     char    *szPath;
00941     TW_INT16  result;
00942 
00943     // Set the context...
00944     result = TWRC_SUCCESS;
00945     pod.m_pSelectDlgAppId = _pAppId;
00946       
00947     // If passed in a DS name we want to select it
00948     if (_pDsId->ProductName[0] != 0)
00949     {
00950     result = GetDSFromProductName(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00951     // If no match continue anyway.
00952     }
00953 
00954     // If not passed a DS or the name was not currently found
00955     // then selete the default
00956     _pDsId->Id = 0;
00957     result = GetMatchingDefault(_pAppId,_pDsId);
00958     pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId = _pDsId;
00959 
00960     // create the dialog window
00961     int ret = (int)::DialogBox(g_hinstance,
00962                    (LPCTSTR)IDD_DLG_SOURCE,
00963                    (HWND)NULL,
00964                    (DLGPROC)::SelectDlgProc);
00965 
00966     // User picked something...
00967     if (ret == IDOK)
00968     {
00969       // Validate the result...
00970         if (!pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId)
00971     {
00972           kLOG((kLOGERR,"We came out of the Select Dialog with a null..."));
00973           pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_OPERATIONERROR);
00974         return TWRC_FAILURE;
00975     }
00976 
00977     // Copy the data over...
00978     *_pDsId = *pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId;
00979 
00980         // save default source to Registry  
00981       // sanity check...
00982       if (   (pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId->Id < 1)
00983         || (pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId->Id >= MAX_NUM_DS))
00984       {
00985       // Failed to save default DS to registry
00986       kLOG((kLOGERR,"Id is out of range 0 - 49..."));
00987       // Nothing preventing us from using the default right now
00988       pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BUMMER);
00989       }
00990 
00991       else
00992       {
00993       // Get the path we're using...
00994       status = ERROR_SUCCESS;
00995       szPath = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetPath(pod.m_pSelectDlgAppId,pod.m_pSelectDlgDsId->Id);
00996 
00997       // Open the key, creating it if it doesn't exist.
00998       if (RegCreateKeyEx(HKEY_CURRENT_USER,
00999                "Software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Twain",
01000                  NULL,
01001                NULL,
01002                NULL,
01003                KEY_READ | KEY_WRITE, NULL,
01004                &hKey,
01005                NULL) == ERROR_SUCCESS)
01006       {
01007         status = RegSetValueEx(hKey,"Default Source",0,REG_SZ,(LPBYTE)szPath,(DWORD)strlen((char*)szPath)+1);
01008         if (status != ERROR_SUCCESS)
01009       {
01010         // Failed to save default DS to registry
01011         kLOG((kLOGERR,"Failed to save default DS to registry"));
01012         // Nothing preventing us from using the default right now
01013         pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BUMMER);
01014       }
01015       }
01016       // Close the key.
01017       RegCloseKey(hKey);
01018       }
01019     }
01020 
01021     // We're cancelling...
01022     else if (ret == IDCANCEL)
01023     {
01024     result = TWRC_CANCEL;
01025     }
01026 
01027     // Something back happened...
01028     else if (ret == -1)
01029     {
01030     ::MessageBox(NULL,"Dialog failed!","Error",MB_OK|MB_ICONINFORMATION);
01031     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BUMMER);
01032     result = TWRC_FAILURE;
01033     }
01034 
01035     return result;
01036 
01037   // We don't support the user selection box on linux...
01038   #elif  (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
01039 
01040   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
01041   return TWRC_FAILURE;
01042 
01043   // Ruh-roh, Reorge...
01044   #else
01045     #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
01046   #endif
01047 }
01048 
01049 
01050 
01057 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::GetDSFromProductName(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
01058                      TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
01059 {
01060   TW_UINT32 ii;
01061 
01062   // Validate...
01063   if (   !pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppValidateId(_pAppId)
01064     || (0 == _pDsId))
01065   {
01066   kLOG((kLOGERR,"bad _pAppId or _pDsId..."));
01067     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01068   }
01069   else if (0 == _pDsId->ProductName[0])
01070   {
01071     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01072   }
01073 
01074   // Search for a match on the ProductName...
01075   for (ii = 1; ii < MAX_NUM_DS; ++ii)
01076   {
01077     // Note that TW_STR32 type is NUL-filled, not NUL-terminated...
01078   if (0 == strncmp(_pDsId->ProductName,
01079            pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,ii)->ProductName,
01080            sizeof(TW_STR32)))
01081     {
01082       // match found, set the index
01083       *_pDsId = *pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,ii);
01084       return TWRC_SUCCESS;
01085     }
01086   }
01087 
01088   // Uh-oh...
01089   return TWRC_FAILURE;
01090 }
01091 
01092 
01093 
01098 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_GetFirst(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
01099                    TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
01100 {
01101   // Validate...
01102   if (   !pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppValidateId(_pAppId)
01103     || (0 == _pDsId))
01104   {
01105   kLOG((kLOGERR,"bad _pAppId or _pDsId..."));
01106   return TWRC_FAILURE;
01107   }
01108 
01109   // There are no supported drivers...
01110   if (pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetNumDs(_pAppId) < 1)
01111   {
01112     // Make sure we fail of GetNext is called...
01113     pod.m_nextDsId = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetNumDs(_pAppId) + 1;
01114     return TWRC_ENDOFLIST;
01115   }
01116 
01117   // Return info on the first driver we found...
01118   pod.m_nextDsId = 1;
01119   *_pDsId = *pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,pod.m_nextDsId);
01120 
01121   // Prep for a call to GetNext...
01122   pod.m_nextDsId += 1;
01123 
01124   // All done...
01125   return TWRC_SUCCESS;
01126 }
01127 
01128 
01129 
01134 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_GetNext(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
01135                 TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
01136 {
01137   // Validate...
01138   if (   !pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppValidateId(_pAppId)
01139     || (0 == _pDsId))
01140   {
01141   kLOG((kLOGERR,"bad _pAppId or _pDsId..."));
01142   return TWRC_FAILURE;
01143   }
01144 
01145   // Applications must call MSG_GETFIRST before making this call...
01146   if (pod.m_nextDsId == 0)
01147   {
01148     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_SEQERROR);
01149     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01150   }
01151   // We're out of items...
01152   else if (pod.m_nextDsId > pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetNumDs(_pAppId))
01153   {
01154   pod.m_nextDsId = 0;
01155     return TWRC_ENDOFLIST;
01156   }
01157 
01158   // Return info on the this driver...
01159   *_pDsId = *pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,pod.m_nextDsId);
01160 
01161   // Prep for a call to GetNext...
01162   pod.m_nextDsId += 1;
01163 
01164   // All done...
01165   return TWRC_SUCCESS;
01166 }
01167 
01168 
01169 
01174 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::GetMatchingDefault(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
01175                    TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId)
01176 {
01177   bool    bMatchFnd = false;
01178   TW_UINT32 ii;
01179 
01180   // Validate...
01181   if (   !pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppValidateId(_pAppId)
01182     || (0 == _pDsId))
01183   {
01184     kLOG((kLOGERR,"bad _pAppId or _pDsId..."));
01185     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01186   }
01187 
01188   // is there something to match to?
01189   if (pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetNumDs(_pAppId) < 1)
01190   {
01191     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_NODS);
01192     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01193   }
01194 
01195   // Something very bad may be happening, so don't let the
01196   // application get away with this...
01197   if (0 != _pDsId->Id)
01198   {
01199     kLOG((kLOGERR,"Please make sure your TW_IDENTITY.Id for your driver (the destination) is zeroed out before making this call..."));
01200     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_OPERATIONERROR);
01201     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01202   }
01203 
01204   // In Windows the default Data Source is stored in the registry
01205   // as the path to that DS.  We will need to compare this to the other DS as a match.
01206   // read default source from Registry
01207   memset(pod.m_DefaultDSPath,0,sizeof(pod.m_DefaultDSPath));
01208 
01209   // Windows uses the registry...
01210   #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP)
01211     HKEY hKey;
01212     if (RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_CURRENT_USER,
01213              "Software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Twain",
01214            0,
01215            KEY_READ,
01216            &hKey) == ERROR_SUCCESS )
01217     {
01218       // Look for the subkey "Default Source".
01219       DWORD DWtype = REG_SZ;
01220       DWORD DWsize = sizeof(pod.m_DefaultDSPath);
01221       BOOL bRunAtStartup = ( RegQueryValueEx(hKey,"Default Source",NULL,&DWtype,(LPBYTE)pod.m_DefaultDSPath,&DWsize) == ERROR_SUCCESS);
01222 
01224       // There wasn't any use of bRunAtStartup before I added this, and
01225       // this is obviously pretty lame, but until I find out how the value
01226       // was to be used I don't want to get rid of it...
01227       if (bRunAtStartup)
01228       {
01229         bRunAtStartup = bRunAtStartup;
01230       }
01231 
01232       // Close the registry key handle.
01233       RegCloseKey(hKey);
01234     }
01235 
01236   // Linux looks in the user's directory...
01237   #elif (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
01238   FILE *pfile;
01239   char *szHome;
01240   char szFile[FILENAME_MAX];
01241   memset(pod.m_DefaultDSPath,0,sizeof(pod.m_DefaultDSPath));
01242   szHome = getenv("HOME");
01243   if (szHome)
01244   {
01245     SSTRCPY(szFile,sizeof(szFile),szHome);
01246     SSTRCAT(szFile,sizeof(szFile),"/.twndsmrc/defaultds");
01247     FOPEN(pfile,szFile,"r");
01248     if (pfile)
01249     {
01250     fread(pod.m_DefaultDSPath,1,sizeof(pod.m_DefaultDSPath)-1,pfile);
01251     fclose(pfile);
01252     }
01253   }
01254 
01255   // eek...
01256   #else
01257     #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
01258   #endif
01259 
01260 
01261   // If current default source is not a match find a new default source
01262   // that will match this app
01263   for (ii = 1; ii < MAX_NUM_DS; ++ii)
01264   {
01265   // Mark the first match to use as default, if we don't
01266   // find a match, this will be the one we go with...
01267     if (!bMatchFnd)
01268     {
01269     *_pDsId = *pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,ii);
01270       bMatchFnd = true;
01271     }
01272 
01273     // If the system default is a match we will use it and stop looking.
01274   if (0 == STRNICMP(pod.m_DefaultDSPath,
01275             pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetPath(_pAppId,ii),
01276             sizeof(pod.m_DefaultDSPath)))
01277     {
01278     *_pDsId = *pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,ii);
01279       bMatchFnd = true;
01280       break;
01281     }
01282   }
01283 
01284   if (!bMatchFnd)
01285   {
01286     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_NODS);
01287     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01288   }
01289 
01290   return TWRC_SUCCESS;
01291 }
01292 
01293 
01294 
01298 bool CTwnDsm::printTripletsInfo(const TW_UINT32 _DG,
01299                                 const TW_UINT16 _DAT,
01300                                 const TW_UINT16 _MSG,
01301                                 const TW_MEMREF _pData)
01302 {
01303   char szDg[64];
01304   char szDat[64];
01305   char szMsg[64];
01306   char szCap[128];
01307   TW_CAPABILITY *_pCap;
01308 
01309   // too many of these messages to log...
01310   if (    (DG_CONTROL == _DG)
01311     &&  (DAT_EVENT == _DAT))
01312   {
01313     return false;
01314   }
01315 
01316   // Convert them...
01317   StringFromDg(szDg,NCHARS(szDg),_DG);
01318   StringFromDat(szDat,NCHARS(szDat),_DAT);
01319   StringFromMsg(szMsg,NCHARS(szMsg),_MSG);
01320 
01321   // Print them, (and give us a blank line)...
01322   kLOG((kLOGINFO,""));
01323   kLOG((kLOGINFO,"%s/%s/%s",szDg,szDat,szMsg));
01324 
01325   // If we're a capability, do some extra work and
01326   // try to tell them what cap it is...
01327   if (   (DG_CONTROL == _DG)
01328     && (DAT_CAPABILITY == _DAT)
01329     && (NULL != _pData))
01330   {
01331     _pCap = (TW_CAPABILITY*)_pData;
01332     StringFromCap(szCap,NCHARS(szCap),_pCap->Cap);
01333     kLOG((kLOGINFO,szCap));
01334   }
01335 
01336   // All done...
01337   return true;
01338 }
01339 
01340 
01341 
01346 TW_INT16 CTwnDsm::DSM_Null(TW_IDENTITY *_pAppId,
01347                TW_IDENTITY *_pDsId,
01348                TW_UINT16   _MSG)
01349 {
01350   TW_CALLBACK *ptwcallback;
01351 
01352   // Validate...
01353   if (   !pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppValidateId(_pAppId)
01354     || (0 == _pDsId))
01355   {
01356     kLOG((kLOGERR,"bad _pAppId or _pDsId..."));
01357   return TWRC_FAILURE;
01358   }
01359 
01360   // Invoke the application's callback to send this message along.
01361   if (   (MSG_DEVICEEVENT != _MSG)
01362     && (MSG_CLOSEDSREQ  != _MSG)
01363     && (MSG_XFERREADY   != _MSG))
01364   {
01365     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppSetConditionCode(_pAppId,TWCC_BADPROTOCOL);
01366     return TWRC_FAILURE;
01367   }
01368 
01369   // Get the current callback...
01370   ptwcallback = pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackGet(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id);
01371 
01372   // We have something to call...
01373   if (0 != ptwcallback)
01374   {
01375     // We should have a try/catch around this...
01376     ((DSMENTRYPROC)(ptwcallback->CallBackProc))(
01377     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppGetIdentity(_pAppId),
01378     pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsGetIdentity(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id),
01379         DG_CONTROL,
01380         DAT_NULL,
01381         _MSG,
01382         0);
01383   }
01384 
01385   // Application has not registered a callback. As a result, the msg will
01386   // be sent to the app the next time it forwards an event.
01389   else
01390   {
01391   ptwcallback->Message = _MSG;
01392   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->DsCallbackSetWaiting(_pAppId,_pDsId->Id,TRUE);
01393   pod.m_ptwndsmapps->AppWakeup(_pAppId);
01394   }
01395 
01396   return TWRC_SUCCESS;
01397 }
01398 
01399 
01400 
01404 void CTwnDsm::StringFromDg(char *_szDg,
01405                int _nChars,
01406                const TW_UINT32 _DG)
01407 {
01408   switch(_DG)
01409   {
01410     default:
01411       SSNPRINTF(_szDg,_nChars,_nChars,"DG_0x%04lx",_DG);
01412       break;
01413 
01414     case DG_CONTROL:
01415       SSTRCPY(_szDg,_nChars,"DG_CONTROL");
01416       break;
01417 
01418     case DG_IMAGE:
01419       SSTRCPY(_szDg,_nChars,"DG_IMAGE");
01420       break;
01421 
01422     case DG_AUDIO:
01423       SSTRCPY(_szDg,_nChars,"DG_AUDIO");
01424       break;
01425   }
01426 }
01427 
01428 
01429 
01433 void CTwnDsm::StringFromDat(char  *_szDat,
01434               int   _nChars,
01435               const TW_UINT16 _DAT)
01436 {
01437   switch(_DAT)
01438   {
01439     default:
01440       SSNPRINTF(_szDat,_nChars,_nChars,"DAT_0x%04x",_DAT);
01441 
01442     case DAT_NULL:
01443       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_NULL");
01444       break;
01445 
01446     case DAT_CUSTOMBASE:
01447       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_CUSTOMBASE");
01448       break;
01449 
01450     case DAT_CAPABILITY:
01451       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_CAPABILITY");
01452       break;
01453 
01454     case DAT_EVENT:
01455       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_EVENT");
01456       break;
01457 
01458     case DAT_IDENTITY:
01459       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_IDENTITY");
01460       break;
01461 
01462     case DAT_PARENT:
01463       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_PARENT");
01464       break;
01465 
01466     case DAT_PENDINGXFERS:
01467       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_PENDINGXFERS");
01468       break;
01469 
01470     case DAT_SETUPMEMXFER:
01471       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_SETUPMEMXFER");
01472       break;
01473 
01474     case DAT_SETUPFILEXFER:
01475       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_SETUPFILEXFER");
01476       break;
01477 
01478     case DAT_STATUS:
01479       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_STATUS");
01480       break;
01481 
01482     case DAT_USERINTERFACE:
01483       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_USERINTERFACE");
01484       break;
01485 
01486     case DAT_XFERGROUP:
01487       SSTRCPY(_szDat,_nChars,"DAT_XFERGROUP");
01488       break;
01489 
01490     case DAT_TWUNKIDENTITY:

02251 
02255 void CTwnDsm::StringFromRC(char *_szRc,
02256                int _nChars,
02257                const TW_UINT16 _rc)
02258 {
02259   switch (_rc)
02260   {
02261     default:    
02262       SSNPRINTF(_szRc,_nChars,_nChars,"TWRC_0x%04x",_rc);
02263     break;
02264 
02265     case TWRC_SUCCESS:
02266       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_SUCCESS");
02267       break;
02268 
02269     case TWRC_FAILURE:
02270       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_FAILURE");
02271       break;
02272 
02273     case TWRC_CHECKSTATUS:
02274       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_CHECKSTATUS");
02275       break;
02276 
02277     case TWRC_CANCEL:
02278       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_CANCEL");
02279       break;
02280 
02281     case TWRC_DSEVENT:
02282       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_DSEVENT");
02283       break;
02284 
02285     case TWRC_NOTDSEVENT:
02286       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_NOTDSEVENT");
02287       break;
02288 
02289     case TWRC_XFERDONE:
02290       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_XFERDONE");
02291       break;
02292 
02293     case TWRC_ENDOFLIST:
02294       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_ENDOFLIST");
02295       break;
02296 
02297     case TWRC_INFONOTSUPPORTED:
02298       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_INFONOTSUPPORTED");
02299       break;
02300 
02301     case TWRC_DATANOTAVAILABLE:
02302       SSTRCPY(_szRc,_nChars,"TWRC_DATANOTAVAILABLE");
02303       break;
02304   }
02305 }
